function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Architects maintaining a passive, apolitical role within existing regulatory and professional norms","Impact":"Limited ability to address societal inequity and systemic issues such as climate breakdown and biodiversity loss","Mitigation":"Encourage architects to challenge existing norms and advocate for radical systemic change","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Architects, local communities, and authorities","Owner":"Architects, advocacy groups, local communities, and authorities"},{"Description":"Disparities in wealth and poverty and formal and informal urban development in the San Diego-Tijuana trans-border urban agglomeration","Impact":"Social and economic inequities, lack of access to resources and opportunities","Mitigation":"Engage in initiatives that influence political and economic frameworks, partner with the community to co-produce new knowledge","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Residents of informal and immigrant neighborhoods, academic institutions, political and economic stakeholders","Owner":"Research institutions, political and economic stakeholders"}]}
